p: COVID-19 has spread globally and has affected most countries; it was defined as a pandemic by the WHO in March 2020 [ 3]. As of March 21, 2020, COVID-19 has affected 186 countries and territories around the world, with more than 280,000 confirmed cases and 11,842 deaths [ 4]. Iran is one of the top 10 countries affected by this virus [ 4].
